channel.title: Yesterday i could connect to my server, and now today i cant?
channel.description: yesterday after making my serve i could connect with my no-ip.biz or my regular ip, now the only thing i can do is connect with 0.0.0.0 my friends cant get on and i dont know what to do. i have my no-ip opened and everything like i had it yesterday. can someone go over the procedures for opening it, i know im suppose to start no-ip, start source then client.

item.title: Yesterday i could connect to my server, and now today i cant?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

YOU: Connect on 127.0.0.1

YOUR PLAYERS: Connect on your No-Ip Adress

Read full topic

item.title: Yesterday i could connect to my server, and now today i cant?
item.dc:creator: @l_skinner_l l skinner l
item.description:
@l_skinner_l wrote:

idk if this helps sometimes i see people saying it might help or might not go to start and go to allow programs through fire wall an add new one the port id is 43594 the reg standerd for rsps and your ip address for your server and then download utorrent and no-ip and then go to utorrent and make the port on it same as for rsps and save it then open utorrent then server then client. sometimes the server dont open cause the server is reading a server already online cause of the utorrent just keep trying tell it opens. goodluck.

Read full topic
